#text=Every Sunday night , I make the weekly trip to the grocery store .
#text=I usually do the majority of my grocery shopping at the local supermarket because the location is convenient and the prices are good .
#text=Before heading to the store , I always go through my freezer , fridge , and cupboards to see what I need or am getting low on .
#text=I then note everything that I need in my shopping list app on my cellphone .
#text=After arriving at the store , I always get produce first .
#text=Then I make my around to grab any dry goods that I need , and then get anything that needs to be be in the fridge or freezer last so that they wo n't be out at room temp for too long .
#text=After I get everything I need , I head to the self-check out .
#text=After paying for my groceries and load them into my car , I drive home .
#text=Once I arrive home , I put all of the groceries away where they belong .
